meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I shoed my horse before the race.
meanings.sent2: She shoed her dolls with tiny boots.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy elf shoed the wrong foot of the gnome!
meanings.sent4: He shoed his words with kindness before speaking.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith shoed the horse with precision and care.

meanings.sent1: The shoed dancers performed gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent2: The shoed hikers trekked through the muddy trail.
meanings.sent3: The shoed penguin waddled happily on the ice.
meanings.sent4: Her shoed feet tapped rhythmically to the music.
meanings.sent5: The shoed athletes sprinted towards the finish line.
